casebody.data:
DEVERZE
v.
JP MORGAN CHASE BANK, N.A. et al. No. S15A0845. Supreme Court of Georgia. Oct. 5, 2015. Jean A. Deverze, Marietta, for appellant. Teah Nicole Glenn, David Marino Pernini, Shawna Marie Portner, Wargo & French LLP, Atlanta, Frank Reid Olson, Cobb, Olson & Andrle, LLC, Atlanta, for appellee.

Opinion

PER CURIAM.

The judgment of the court below is affirmed without opinion pursuant to Supreme Court Rule 59.

Affirmed without opinion.

All the Justices concur.
